reviews.review:
I used to play ALOT of CoD, and tought: "wow, fps games ain't getting better than this!". Until off course, one faithfull day i came across to Counter-Strike 1.6 via a friend.

Having played the game for about a month i started to think: "well this certainly is something a bit more interesting than cod". Yes, just "a bit".
Yet that bit made me play 1.6 half of the time i could've play cod.

And then, i found Source via the same friend once again. And i just about imediatly stopped with all the cod gaming, and turned to the half-realistic fps, CS:S.

The upgrades resulted in a more strategic gameplay, and more skill need for them kills.
And those upgrades just amazed me.

Nowadays, the only fps game i play is Source, and i still can't get enough :)
не 1.6 по физике, как говориться "раньше было лучше"

Dont buy it buy Counter strike Global Offensive its better 

But this game is good too just no better THAN CSGO

Counter Strike : Source = 10 Euro

Counter Strike : Source , Day of Defeat Source, Half Life 2 : Deathmatch = 5,74 Euro

10/10 Would meat again the valve sales.
Great game. If you play garry's mod you'll need this for all of your missing textures.

Making maps is great fun to test with bots there so smart!
so fun there are so many fun servers there are servers for mini games, gun game, ect. its an over all fun game to play

I love this game, years after release and I still get many hours on it per month. Met a lot of great people through CSS aswell as my fiance.

pode ter os seus problemas...não é tão preciso, para mim como o counter strike normal e como o counter strike condition zero...

Não há tanta mira e tanta destreza...está mais fraco em termos de aim...de resto melhora tudo um pouco dos anteriores.

Pelo preço certo, recomendo o jogo...
